{ðŸ“… events} Be sure to check out the [upcoming Share & Play events](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/) hosted by the [St Louis Game Dev Co-op](http://stlgamedev.com/)!

{ðŸ†˜ help wanted} [Axol Studio, LLC](https://axolstudio.com/) is looking for a few playtesters for their upcoming UI/UX update for [Bring It On!](https://axolstudio.com/projects/bring-it-on/). Get in touch with Tim at: [tim@axolstudio.com](mailto:tim@axolstudio.com)
{ðŸŽ® releases} Colin Schulte has released a demo for their game The Road Jess Traveled and is lookin for feedback. [Try it here](https://colinschulte.github.io/JessDemo/)
{!header} Hello and welcome to the Roundup! Not a lot going on this time around but remember: ANYONE can add their own news to the next Roundup!
